Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Prohibits the diminution of health insurance benefits of certain public employee retirees
Summary: Prohibits the diminution of health insurance benefits of public employee retirees and their dependents or reducing the employer's contributions for such insurance; defines employers to include the state, municipalities, school districts, and public authorities and commissions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to affecting the health insurance benefits and contributions of certain retired public employees ;.us on;
